duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop testable, high-quality, and ship-ready code with ample test coverage.
Work with Product Management and other developers to understand and translate engineering requirements into design requirements and provide estimates.
Think about how to solve problems at scale and build fault-tolerant systems using microservice architecture.
Work as part of a cross-site development team to drive design implementation, testing and release of products.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Computer Science or relevant field of study (MS preferred)
